content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Now, let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay for a month's rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in the apartment, and I'm looking to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to pay €650 per month for the one-bedroom apartment. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €650 is much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a price closer to €800 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time, but I'm not able to meet your asking price of €800 per month. I'm willing to pay €700 per month, which I believe is a fair offer considering the current market conditions. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €700 is still below my target price. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the quality of this newly built apartment in the city center. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a price that reflects the value of the property. How about €750 per month? Is this more acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. Your apartment does offer a great location and quality. I'm willing to increase my offer to €725 per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects both the value of the property and my budget. Would you be willing to accept this revised offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but €725 is still not quite what I'm aiming for. I'm looking for a price that will ensure a long-term, stable tenant for this beautiful apartment. How about €775 per month? This should be a good balance between your budget and the value of the property. Is this a price you can consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence in finding a fair price is commendable. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose €750 per month as a balanced offer that reflects the quality of the apartment and my budget. Would you be willing to accept this final offer from me?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that you're willing to meet me halfway. Your offer of €750 per month is closer to my expectations. However, I still believe that a slightly higher price would be more fair for both parties. How about €765 per month? This would be the lowest price I would consider for this apartment. Is this a price you can agree to?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your dedication to securing the best price for your apartment is impressive. I respect your stance. I'm prepared to make one final concession. I offer you €760 per month for the one-bedroom apartment. This is my absolute highest offer, and I believe it is a fair and competitive price for the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of €760 per month is very close to my desired price. After careful consideration, I'm willing to accept this as a fair and reasonable rent for the apartment. I agree to the price of €760 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
